name: saviors_of_kamigawa
description: A very large package modeled on Saviors of Kamigawa (2005). Includes mechanics and themes: Wisdom (hand size matters), Sweep, Channel, Epic, Arcane/Spiritcraft, Samurai/Bushido, Moonfolk land-bounce, maximum hand size tweaks, and a sprinkling of Flip-inspired text. Effect templates are weighted and gated by mana value ranges to keep results sane.
